questions.question: What is the probability of getting a tail when a fair coin is tossed?
In a single roll of a die, what is the probability of rolling a number greater than 4?
If a bag contains 3 red balls and 2 blue balls, what is the probability of drawing a red ball?
What is the probability of drawing a queen from a standard deck of 52 playing cards?
In a class of 40 students, 24 are girls. What is the probability of randomly selecting a boy?
What is the probability of rolling an even number on a fair six-sided die?
If two dice are rolled, what is the probability that the sum is 8?
In a bag of 10 balls, 4 are green, 3 are red, and 3 are blue. What is the probability of drawing a blue ball?
What is the probability of not rolling a 3 on a fair die?
If a card is drawn from a standard deck of cards, what is the probability of drawing a heart?
A box contains 5 red, 7 blue, and 8 green balls. What is the probability of picking a red ball?
In a lottery, there are 100 tickets, and 1 ticket is winning. What is the probability of selecting the winning ticket?
If a spinner is divided into 4 equal sections numbered 1 to 4, what is the probability of landing on an odd number?
A die is rolled. What is the probability of getting a number less than 5?
If a student guesses on a multiple-choice test with 4 options for each question, what is the probability of answering a question correctly?
A bag contains 10 marbles, 4 of which are blue. What is the probability of drawing a non-blue marble?
If a student draws a card from a standard deck, what is the probability that it is either a king or a queen?
If the probability of an event happening is 0.2, what is the probability of it not happening?
What is the probability of drawing a face card (jack, queen, king) from a standard deck of cards?
What is the probability of rolling a sum of 10 with two dice?
